title: 原版无法启动
author: Czy2019
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I bet Cylons wouldn't have this problem.

Time: 20-2-25 上午9:11
Description: Initializing game

java.lang.IllegalStateException: GLFW error 65542: WGL: The driver does not appear to support OpenGL
        at cuo.b(SourceFile:199)
        at org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWErrorCallbackI.callback(GLFWErrorCallbackI.java:36)
        at org.lwjgl.system.JNI.invokePPPP(Native Method)

        at org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFW.glfwCreateWindow(GLFW.java:1897)

        at dnr.a(SourceFile:19)
        at cyc.au(SourceFile:464)
        at cyc.b(SourceFile:394)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:155)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- Head --
Thread: Client thread
Stacktrace:

-- Initialization --
Details:
Stacktrace:
        at cyc.b(SourceFile:394)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:155)

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.14.4
        Minecraft Version ID: 1.14.4
        Operating System: Windows 10 (amd64) version 10.0
        Java Version: 1.8.0_172, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 321652752 bytes (306 MB) / 536870912 bytes (512 MB) up to 3221225472 bytes (3072 MB)
        CPUs: 16
        JVM Flags: 6 total; -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -Xmn256m -Xmx3072m

无法启动 显卡驱动已经安装
具体看日志

replies.author: Czy2019
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Czy2019 于 2020-2-25 09:34 编辑 
yan_xia 发表于 2020-2-25 09:23
java版本有点低哦
我用的是N卡 内存3GNVIDIA GeForce GTX 660

replies.author: yan_xia
replies.txt_content:
Czy2019 发表于 2020-2-25 09:24
我用的是N卡 内存6GNVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
原版启动和显卡没什么关系，但是你java版本有点低awa，配置肯定够的

replies.author: Czy2019
replies.txt_content:

原版启动和显卡没什么关系，但是你java版本有点低awa，配置肯定够的
那请问怎么解决呢java已换

replies.author: yan_xia
replies.txt_content: java.lang.IllegalStateException: GLFW error 65542: WGL: The driver does not appear to support OpenGL这边说你的显卡驱动错误，你能切换显卡吗，我不是太明白显卡驱动，你的独显可能没跑起来，更新驱动也没用吗

replies.author: yan_xia
replies.txt_content:
yan_xia 发表于 2020-2-25 09:40
java.lang.IllegalStateException: GLFW error 65542: WGL: The driver does not appear to support OpenGL ...
应该是核显不支持openGL

replies.author: Czy2019
replies.txt_content:
yan_xia 发表于 2020-2-25 09:40
java.lang.IllegalStateException: GLFW error 65542: WGL: The driver does not appear to support OpenGL ...
更新驱动无效 无法换显卡
老显卡丢了

replies.txt_content:
Czy2019 发表于 2020-2-25 09:59
无效
或者找到你显卡那两年的驱动，我没得办法了（今日不再回复）

replies.author: Eric12324
replies.txt_content: 你把现在的显卡驱动卸载，然后到Nvdia官网下载一个Nvdia GeForce Experience的东西，用这个东**装显卡驱动，它会自动帮你选驱动版本，我怀疑你驱动版本不对，这样的话就会出现一些怪毛病。https://www.geforce.cn/geforce-experience/download。打开后往下翻找到下载按钮下载就行了。

replies.author: Czy2019
replies.txt_content:
已自行解决 
方法： 切换使用显卡生存图像 原显卡驱动尚未加载
